SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Helpers
Utility class containing shared logic for parsing JSON strings and handling HTTP network requests.
ISCS
The Inter-service Communication Service class.
ISCS.ISCSHandler
The ISCSHandler examines incoming requests and sends them to the appropriate user/product service.
OrderService
The API gateway for the system.
OrderService.ForwardHandler
Handler that forwards requests to ISCS
OrderService.OrderHandler
Processes the order placement via requests through multiple service calls
ProductService
Service responsible for managing product inventory, including creation, retrieval (info), updating, and deletion of products.
ProductService.ProductHandler
HTTP Handler for processing all requests directed to the /product endpoint.
UserService
Service responsible for managing user accounts, including creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of user data.
UserService.UserHandler
HTTP Handler for processing all requests directed to the /user endpoint.
WorkloadParser
Utility to parse workload files containing scripted commands for the microservices and execute them by making HTTP requests to the OrderService.
